name: k6testsfordeckofcardsapi
description: Below is a quick summary of the technical prep and what to expect in the interview. API to Test Please start by reviewing the Deck of Cards API repo: https://github.com/crobertsbmw/deckofcards We strongly recommend pulling it down locally (vs. using a hosted version) so you have more flexibility in the load you can administer and the tests you can perform. Repository Setup Create a new public GitHub repository Write a series of performance tests against the Deck of Cards API Tests must be written in TypeScript using k6 README & Test Plan Add a README that breaks down your test plan, including: Your performance testing approach and scenarios How youâ€™re measuring and evaluating performance for the API
